name: Combo Farm
description:
This is a mix of farm puzzle with a little bit of twist, comes with 10 levels!

Your main objective is to plan piping to water the plants in your farm, and make them COMBO grow!

The higher combos you achieve, the more points you will get!

Controls/Steps:

1. Choose/Rotate Pipes with [1] [2] [3] [4] keys.

2. Plant Pipes with mouse left-click on the farm.

3. Left-click to cancel or undo a planted pipe.
